skills.desc: Sacrifices HP equal to 10% of this Champion's MAX HP, then heals a target ally by 10% of their MAX HP. Also has a 40% chance of placing a 7.5% [Continuous Heal] buff on that ally for 1 turn.
skills.name: Spirits' Verdict
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
